Name: Dystopy
About the game: DYSTOPY is a hybrid game mixing elements of a beat emâ€™ up action game and a platformer. The journey focuses around Sasha, a young mechanic and her robot R0-X4-N3. In search of Sasha's father the duo will face off against Tekkrat, a sinister corporation, battling against all odds through its countless henchmen and their advanced arsenal. A product entirely developed in 15 weeks by the students of Campus ADN, class of 2015-2016, within their third trimester as a final school-studio project.
